QuoteLineGroup.name: QuoteLineGroup
QuoteLineGroup.description: Stores the group information for line items in a quote. It also stores the aggregated line field information (subtotal). It contains a parent-child relationship to quote.

QuoteId.description: The quote associated with the group.

SortOrder.description: Number indicating the sort order selected by the user.

SummarySubtotal.description: The total amount of all the line items in the group.
